seo: Ruby On Rails,任意文件读取漏洞,CVE-2018-3760,漏洞检测
seo_en: Ruby On Rails,Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability,CVE-2018-3760,Vulnerability Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测Ruby On Rails应用是否存在CVE-2018-3760任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定请求尝试读取系统文件/etc/passwd来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Ruby On Rails application has the CVE-2018-3760 arbitrary file read vulnerability. It constructs specific requests to attempt reading the system file /etc/passwd to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
